description:
Why is someone with zero qualifications getting major coverage for their unqualified opinion?  Does anyone want to ask Yahoo! this question? ""In a newly released interview taped Thursday, philanthropist Melinda Gates weighed in, warning that some governors are opening their states too quickly and as a result the nation may experience a surge of coronavirus cases."" https://finance.yahoo.com/news/melinda-gates-some-governors-are-moving-too-fast-to-reopen-their-states-184701807.html

#notanexpert #notqualified #notnews #covid #covid19 #coronavirus #notobillgates #saynotobillgates #notomelindagates #thiscantbereal
